hypotheses.title: Unusual AWS Root Account Console Login Detected
hypotheses.action: Hunt for AWS console logins by the root account, especially from new IPs or regions, within the last 1h.

sigma.yaml:
title: AWS Root Account Console Login
logsource:
  product: aws
  category: authentication
  service: cloudtrail
detection:
    selection:
      eventName: ConsoleLogin
      userIdentity.type: Root
    condition: selection

splunk.spl: index=cloudtrail eventName=ConsoleLogin userIdentity.type=Root | stats count by sourceIPAddress, awsRegion, userIdentity.arn

hypotheses.findings_example: Root account login from IP '192.168.1.1' in 'us-west-2' region.

hypotheses.title: AWS Root Account API Usage Spike
hypotheses.action: Identify spikes in API calls by root account (>10 calls in 5m) to sensitive services like IAM, EC2.

sigma.yaml:
title: AWS Root Account API Usage Spike
logsource:
  product: aws
  category: api
  service: cloudtrail
detection:
    selection:
      userIdentity.type: Root
    filter:
      eventSource|contains: ['iam.amazonaws.com', 'ec2.amazonaws.com']
    condition: selection and filter

splunk.spl: index=cloudtrail userIdentity.type=Root | stats count by eventSource | where count > 10

hypotheses.findings_example: Root account made 15 API calls to 'iam.amazonaws.com' in 5 minutes.

hypotheses.title: AWS Root Account Access Key Creation
hypotheses.action: Detect creation of new access keys by root account in the last 1h.

sigma.yaml:
title: AWS Root Account Access Key Creation
logsource:
  product: aws
  category: iam
  service: cloudtrail
detection:
    selection:
      eventName: CreateAccessKey
      userIdentity.type: Root
    condition: selection

hypotheses.findings_example: Root account created a new access key with ID 'AKIA...'.

hypotheses.title: Unauthorized AWS Root Account Password Change
hypotheses.action: Monitor for password changes initiated by root account within the past 10m.

sigma.yaml:
title: AWS Root Account Password Change
logsource:
  product: aws
  category: iam
  service: cloudtrail
detection:
    selection:
      eventName: ChangePassword
      userIdentity.type: Root
    condition: selection

hypotheses.findings_example: Root account password changed from IP '203.0.113.0'.

hypotheses.title: AWS Root Account MFA Deactivation
hypotheses.action: Identify deactivation of MFA devices associated with root account over the past 1h.

sigma.yaml:
title: AWS Root Account MFA Deactivation
logsource:
  product: aws
  category: iam
  service: cloudtrail
detection:
    selection:
      eventName: DeactivateMFADevice
      userIdentity.type: Root
    condition: selection

hypotheses.findings_example: Root account MFA device deactivated from IP '198.51.100.1'.
